meanings.definition: The act of accepting or receiving something.
meanings.sent1: Her quick acceptations of gifts always brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent2: The company's acceptations of new ideas led to great success.
meanings.sent3: His acceptations of compliments were as swift as a cheetah.
meanings.sent4: The garden welcomed the rain with open acceptations, soaking up every drop.
meanings.sent5: The child's eager acceptations of candy made him a favorite among his friends.

meanings.definition: The way in which a word or phrase is understood or interpreted.
meanings.sent1: Different cultures may have varied acceptations of the same symbol.
meanings.sent2: The poet's acceptations of language were unique and thought-provoking.
meanings.sent3: The cat's confused acceptations of the word 'treat' made for a funny moment.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held a deep acceptation of the world around her, seeing beauty in everything.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's clear acceptations of the lesson helped the students understand easily.
